salp.heading: Welcome at the Security Awarness Learning Platform - SALP
salp.text: This Platform aims to improve your security awarness skills.

text.username: At first, please enter your username you want to use.

docker.description1: SALP provides you some examples to try out. SALP uses
docker.description2: as a virtualization solution for these examples.
docker.installation1: If you want to be able to try out the examples, you need to
docker.installation2: if it's not allready installed on your system.

matomo.part2: to track user behavior, and improve the user experience by using 'Machine Learning' algorithms.
matomo.optOut: If you don't want allow tracking by Matomo, you can opt-out:
